value.stringValue: IoT Connectivity / Fleet Management can NOT be selected with other products.
Home Office can NOT be selected with other products

decisions.description:
Check if the Contract is associated with any Ongoing Amendment Opportunity. This was answered in the call to subflow Get_Ongoing_Amendment_Opportunity
Definition of Ongoing Amendment Opportunity: 1. Open Amendment Opportunity 2. Closed Amendment Opportunity with Open Cases (Order Fulfilment Case)
decisions.name: Ongoing_Amendment_Opportunity_Exists
decisions.label: Ongoing Amendment Opportunity Exists

decisions.name: Products_in_Scope_Contains_Home_Office
decisions.label: Products in Scope Contains Home Office?

decisions.name: Selected_Home_Office_with_other_products
decisions.label: Selected Home Office with other products

decisions.name: Selected_IoT_or_Fleet_with_other_products
decisions.label: Selected IoT or Fleet with other products ?

rules.name: IoT_or_Fleet_selected_with_oter_products
rules.label: IoT or Fleet selected with oter products

rules.name: Yes_Home_Office_or_Business_Internet_Framework_Included
rules.label: Yes, Home Office or Business Internet Framework Included

formulas.description: Boolean formula which determines if the products in scope include Home Office plus minimum one other product.
formulas.name: ProductsInScopeIncludeHomeOfficePlusMinimumOneOther
ProductsInScopeText
formulas.expression: IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Call Guide"), "ACE; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Dual SIM"), "Dual SIM; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "DaaS"), "DaaS; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Fastnettelefoni"), "Fastnettelefoni; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Fleet Management"), "Fleet Management; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Home Office"), "Home Office; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Internet"), "Internet; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "IoT"), "IoT Connectivity; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "M2M"), "M2M; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "MBB"), "MBB; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "MPLS"), "MPLS; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "SD WAN"), "SD WAN; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Security"), "Security; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "SIP Fastnet"), "SIP Fastnet; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Unified Communication"), "Unified Communication; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Voice"), "Voice; ",null) & IF(INCLUDES({!OpportunityProducts}, "Other"), "Other; ",null)

fields.name: Need_help_with_data_collection_BI
fields.helpText: Please indicate if you would like to request help with data collection for this Opportunity.

fields.name: Agreement_Type_BI
fields.helpText:
When choosing Framework, a Quote containing all available Business Internet products is created, as well as a Case.


When choosing Specified, only a Case is created initially. When the onboarding experience is finished, a Quote will be created with the products chosen.

fields.name: Type
fields.helpText:
New Business: Selling to a new customer with no existing engagement(s)

Cross sell: Selling something new to an existing customer

Up sale: Selling more of something the customer already has

Renewal: Renewing an existing agreement

fields.name: Amount
fields.helpText: K12 - the estimated value of the first 12 months of the contract. When a Quote is added to the Opportunity the Contract Revenue will reflect total Contract value from the Quote and will be locked for changes. All changes to Contract Revenue is to be done through the Quote

fields.name: Products_in_scope
fields.helpText: Specify here which products are included in this opportunity. Use CTRL if you want to select more than one proudct.

fields.name: OwnershipOutsideEU
fields.fieldText: The customer is owned, partly owned or controlled by persons or companies in countries outside EU, Great Britain, Norway, Faroe Islands, Switzerland, Greenland, North America, Australia and New Zealand

fields.name: DeliveryOutsideEU
fields.fieldText: The products in scope are to be delivered outside EU, Great Britain, Norway, Faroe Islands, Switzerland, Greenland, North America, Australia and New Zealand

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_create_the_Quote_now
fields.fieldText: Will you create the Quote right after this?

screens.description: Screen used to indicate to user that an ongoing Amendment Opportunity exists. Therefore the user is not allowed to create an Amendment Opportunity.
screens.name: Prevent_Amendment_Creation
screens.label: Prevent Amendment Creation

fields.name: Title
fields.fieldText:
Info

The Contract cannot be amended due to an ongoing Amendment Opportunity

fields.name: OngoingAmendmentOpportunityIsOpen
fields.fieldText: The ongoing Amendment Opportunity is still Open.

fields.name: OngoingAmendmentOpportunityIsClosed
fields.fieldText: The ongoing Amendment Opportunity is Closed, but there are still one or more Open Order Fulfilment Case(s).

fields.name: AlreadyAnOngoingAmendment
fields.fieldText: To go to the Opportunity please click this link {!Get_Ongoing_Amendment_Opportunity.varR_OngoingAmendmentOpportunity.Name}

subflows.name: Run_Automatic_Quote_Creation_Handling_Flow
subflows.label: Run Automatic Quote Creation Handling Flow

textTemplates.name: VoiceRenewalError
textTemplates.text: You are not allowed to manually create Renewal Opportunities for Voice, Dual SIM, MBB, M2M or Unified Communication. Please use the system generated Renewal Opportunity visible on your Contract.
